div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 108 Mycenae, 1939 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 9 AR. From excavations Phocis: 2 hemidr. Thebes: 1 hemidr. Aegina: 3 st. (2 turtles, 1 tortoise) Sicyon: 1 tetradr. (cf. BMC 46, good condition) Argos: 2 hemidr. (early) Disposition: Nauplion Wace, BSA 1950, p. 224 To be published by J. Dengate
